title: SNY tab displays in the Header
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has entitlements for SNY
AND the user launches the MLB.TV app

**NOTE:** SNY entitlement = SNY_121
custom_steps: WHEN the user logs in
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see [Home], [SNY], [Games], [Upgrade MLB.TV], [Settings] in the header

**NOTE:** If the test user also has one of the following entitlements, "EXECMLB", "MLBALL", "MLBVIDEOADOBEPASS", "MLBVIDEOAR", [Upgrade MLB.TV] will NOT display.

title: SNLA+ tab displays in the Header
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has entitlements for SNLA+
AND the user launches the MLB.TV app

**NOTE:** SNLA+ entitlement = SNLA_119
custom_steps: WHEN the user logs in
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see [Home], [SNLA+], [Games], [Upgrade MLB.TV], [Settings] in the header

**NOTE:** If the test user also has one of the following entitlements, "EXECMLB", "MLBALL", "MLBVIDEOADOBEPASS", "MLBVIDEOAR", [Upgrade MLB.TV] will NOT display.

title: SNY page loads
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has entitlements for SNY
AND the user launches the MLB.TV app
AND the user logs in

**NOTE:** SNY entitlement = SNY_121
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the [SNY] tab in the header
custom_expected:
THEN the SNY page loads successfully
AND SNY content is present in the Hero
AND a title is present in the Hero
AND a description is present in the Hero
AND a SNY related background image is present in the Hero
AND a [Watch Live] button is present in the Hero
AND text "PRESENTED BY" is displayed below the [Watch Live] button
AND the presented by Logo is displayed below the "PRESENTED BY" text
AND SNY related carousels are displayed
AND VOD cards are displayed in the carousels for available VOD content
AND analytics are sent to Adobe Analytics

**NOTE:** "Presented By" and logo are feature flagged and may not display based on the set value. This can be checked in one of the following (based on environment) "base.json", "dev.json", "qa.json", "prod.json". Path: rsn -> sny -> enabled

title: SNLA+ page loads
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has entitlements for SNLA+
AND the user launches the MLB.TV app
AND the user logs in

**NOTE:** SNLA+ entitlement = SNLA_119
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the [SNLA+] tab in the header
custom_expected:
THEN the SNLA+ page loads successfully
AND SNLA+ content is present in the Hero
AND a title is present in the Hero
AND a description is present in the Hero
AND a SNLA+ related background image is present in the Hero
AND a [Watch Live] button is present in the Hero
AND the presented by Logo is displayed below the [Watch Live] button
AND SNLA+ related carousels are displayed
AND VOD cards are displayed in the carousels for available VOD content
AND analytics are sent to Adobe Analytics

**NOTE:** "Presented By" and logo are feature flagged and may not display based on the set value. This can be checked in one of the following (based on environment) "base.json", "dev.json", "qa.json", "prod.json". Path: rsn -> snla -> enabled

title: Fetch SNY data via contentCollections
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has entitlements for SNY
AND the user launches the MLB.TV app
AND the user logs in

**NOTE:** SNY entitlement = SNY_121
custom_steps: WHEN the user successfully logs in
custom_expected:
THEN a "contentCollections" network call is made via "graphql"
AND the data returned from "contentCollections" is stored in Redux under "rsn"

**NOTE:** This needs to be tested with access to network calls, and Redux. Best way is via Chrome. Redux is a browser extension that may need to be downloaded and added to your browser.

custom_preconds:

AND the data returned from "contentCollections" is stored in Redux under "rsn"

**NOTE:** This needs to be tested with access to network calls, and Redux. Best way is via Chrome. Redux is a browser extension that may need to be downloaded and added to your browser.

title: SNY 24/7 feed playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has entitlements for SNY
AND the user launches the MLB.TV app
AND the user logs in

**NOTE:** SNY entitlement = SNY_121
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the [SNY] button in the header
AND selects the [Watch Live] button in the Hero
custom_expected:
THEN the SNY 24/7 linear feed plays back successfully
AND the video title displays left justified above the scrubber bar
AND analytics are sent to Adobe Analytics
AND analytics are sent to Conviva

title: SNY contentCollections calls are made in 5 minute intervals
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has entitlements for SNY
AND the user launches the MLB.TV app
AND the user logs in

**NOTE:** SNY entitlement = SNY_121
custom_steps: WHEN the user sits stationary in the app
custom_expected: THEN "contentCollections" calls are made via "graphql" every 5 minutes

title: SNLA+ contentCollections calls are made in 5 minute intervals
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has entitlements for SNLA+
AND the user launches the MLB.TV app
AND the user logs in

**NOTE:** SNLA+ entitlement = SNLA_119
custom_steps: WHEN the user sits stationary in the app
custom_expected: THEN "contentCollections" calls are made via "graphql" every 5 minutes

title: SNY 24/7 feed - Mid-roll DAI Ads
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has entitlements for SNY
AND the user launches the MLB.TV app
AND the user logs in
AND the user has initiated playback of the 24/7 SNY feed
AND the 24/7 SNY stream has adsEnabled equals true in the graphql Preview/Response (data->initPlaybackSession->adExperience->adsEnabled)
AND an asset key is is returned in the same graphql Preview/Response (data->initPlaybackSession->adExperience->adEngineIdentifiers)

**NOTE:** SNY entitlement = SNY_121
Enter "graphql" into the Network search of Dev Tools to find the initPlaybackSession
THIS NEEDS TO BE TESTED IN A BROWSER
custom_steps: WHEN an ad break is triggered
custom_expected:
THEN we should see ads playing back
AND "id3-events.json" network calls are being made
AND the "id3-events.json" network calls have a request URL starting with "https://dai.google.com/"

**NOTE:** Entering "stream" into the Network search of Dev Tools should filter out the id3-events.json network calls

title: SNLA+ 24/7 feed - Mid-roll DAI Ads
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has entitlements for SNLA+
AND the user launches the MLB.TV app
AND the user logs in
AND the user has initiated playback of the 24/7 SNLA+ feed
AND the 24/7 SNLA+ stream has adsEnabled equals true in the graphql Preview/Response (data->initPlaybackSession->adExperience->adsEnabled)
AND an asset key is is returned in the same graphql Preview/Response (data->initPlaybackSession->adExperience->adEngineIdentifiers)

**NOTE:** SNLA+ entitlement = SNLA_119
Enter "graphql" into the Network search of Dev Tools to find the initPlaybackSession
THIS NEEDS TO BE TESTED IN A BROWSER
custom_steps: WHEN an ad break is triggered
custom_expected:
THEN we should see ads playing back
AND "id3-events.json" network calls are being made
AND the "id3-events.json" network calls have a request URL starting with "https://dai.google.com/"

**NOTE:** Entering "stream" into the Network search of Dev Tools should filter out the id3-events.json network calls

title: SNY 24/7 feed - DAI requests stop after exiting a stream
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has entitlements for SNY
AND the user launches the MLB.TV app
AND the user logs in
AND the user has initiated playback of the 24/7 SNY feed

**NOTE:** SNY entitlement = SNY_121
custom_steps: WHEN a user exits the 24/7 live stream
custom_expected:
THEN video playback is dismissed
AND "id3-events.json" network calls to dai.google.com are no longer occurring

**NOTE:** Entering "stream" into the Network search of Dev Tools should filter out the id3-events.json network calls

title: SNLA+ 24/7 feed - DAI requests stop after exiting a stream
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has entitlements for SNLA+
AND the user launches the MLB.TV app

AND the user has initiated playback of the 24/7 SNLA+ feed

**NOTE:** SNLA+ entitlement = SNLA_119
custom_steps: WHEN a user exits the 24/7 live stream
custom_expected:
THEN video playback is dismissed
AND "id3-events.json" network calls to dai.google.com are no longer occurring

**NOTE:** Entering "stream" into the Network search of Dev Tools should filter out the id3-events.json network calls

title: SNY 24/7 feed - Mid-roll DAI Ads failover mid-stream
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has entitlements for SNY
AND the user launches the MLB.TV app
AND the user logs in
AND the user has initiated playback of the 24/7 SNY feed
AND the 24/7 SNY stream has adsEnabled equals true in the graphql Preview/Response (data->initPlaybackSession->adExperience->adsEnabled)
AND an asset key is is returned in the same graphql Preview/Response (data->initPlaybackSession->adExperience->adEngineIdentifiers)

**NOTE:** SNY entitlement = SNY_121
Enter "graphql" into the Network search of Dev Tools to find the initPlaybackSession
THIS NEEDS TO BE TESTED IN A BROWSER
custom_steps:
WHEN an ad break is triggered
AND network calls to "dai.google.com*" are blocked
OR network calls to "dai.google.com*" are failing
custom_expected:
THEN the stream continues to playback with no video error modal popping up
AND ads playback during ad breaks

title: SNY 24/7 feed - DAI Ads failover at stream start
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has entitlements for SNY
AND the user launches the MLB.TV app
AND the user logs in
AND network calls to "pubads.g.doubleclick.net" are blocked
OR network calls to "pubads.g.doubleclick.net" are failing

**NOTE:** SNY entitlement = SNY_121
THIS NEEDS TO BE TESTED IN A BROWSER
custom_steps: WHEN the user initiates playback of the 24/7 SNY feed
custom_expected:
THEN playback is initiated with no video error modal popping up
AND a gsId is not displayed in the lower right corner of the screen

title: SNY 24/7 feed video error at start up
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has entitlements for SNY
AND the user launches the MLB.TV app
AND the user logs in
AND the user is on the SNY page
AND network requests to "tve-live.mlb.com" are blocked via Chrome DevTools

**NOTE:** SNY entitlement = SNY_121
This will need to be tested on a Chrome browser using DevTools
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "Watch Live" button in the Hero
custom_expected:
THEN playback of the 24/7 SNY feed is unsuccessful
AND a Video Error modal displays with a "Go Back" button
AND the "Go Back" button navigates the user back to the SNY page

title: SNY 24/7 feed video error during playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has entitlements for SNY
AND the user launches the MLB.TV app
AND the user logs in
AND the user is on the SNY page

**NOTE:** SNY entitlement = SNY_121
This will need to be tested on a Chrome browser using DevTools
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the "Watch Live" button in the Hero
AND lets the feed playback for a few moments
AND network requests to "tve-live.mlb.com" are blocked via Chrome DevTools
custom_expected:
THEN playback of the 24/7 SNY feed is interrupted 
AND a Video Error modal displays with a "Go Back" button
AND the "Go Back" button navigates the user back to the SNY page
